title: Do Brooke Nichols, the infectious disease modeler at Boston University School of Public Health, who seems to be advocating re-opening of public schools children go to public or private school? - Quora

response.answer_text: Where’s the verb in the sentence fragment. Shouldn’t the verb ‘to do’ be conjugated does? It appears you are alluding to re-opening of public and private schools. But what’s the question. It’s just confusing.
